description.p: You touch a nonmagical object, which must be contained entirely within a 5-foot cube, and revert it into its raw materials. For example, an iron sword with a wooden handle targeted by this spell may transform into chunks of iron ore and chips of wood. The exact composition of the converted material is determined by the DM.
If you target an object being held or carried by an unwilling creature, that creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the spell fails.
